title: Actions
content:
Gong of the Summit

Damages all nearby creatures and objects. Creatures made of inorganic material such as stone have Disadvantage on their Saving Throw.

3d8 ThunderRange: 18m CON Save

Requires: Illithid Powers

Concentrated Blast

6~363d6 Psychic +3d6 Conditional

You must be concentrating on another spell to cast this. if the target was concentrating, you heal as much as the damage that was dealt to it. The spell you were concentrating on, will end.

Requires: Illithid Powers
